# AVCaptureDevice.TorchMode.auto

**Case**

The capture device continuously monitors light levels and uses the torch when necessary.

## Declaration

```swift
case auto
```

## Torch modes

- **AVCaptureDevice.TorchMode.off**: The capture device torch is always off.
- **AVCaptureDevice.TorchMode.on**: The capture device torch is always on.
